thread.title: Macklemore and Ryan Lewis Announce Dates for 2016 Tour
thread.title_full: Macklemore and Ryan Lewis Announce Dates for 2016 Tour

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Macklemore and Ryan Lewis Announce Dates for 2016 Tour
text:
Comments Titled 'An Evening With Macklemore and Ryan Lewis', the tour will launch on January 9 presumably to support the duo's upcoming sophomore album. 
With a new album underway and another hit single still climbing up the charts, Macklemore & Ryan Lewis have announced that they're going on a tour next year. Macklemore revealed its details, including the venues and dates, in a tweet he posted on Monday, October 12. "Thrilled to say that Ry and I are hitting the road again in 2016. Pre-sale starts this Wed," he wrote, captioning the tour's itinerary. Titled "An Evening With Macklemore & Ryan Lewis", the jaunt will start on January 9 in Phoenix and hit some U.S. cities like Houston, Miami, Washington, D.C., Nashvill and Detroit before concluding on February 5 in Milwaukee. Thrilled to say that Ry and I are hitting the road again in 2016. Pre-sale starts this Wed. http://t.co/wxdkkI5kpk pic.twitter.com/pIyKK6oGZB — Macklemore (@macklemore) October 12, 2015 Macklemore & Ryan Lewis are currently readying their second album. Still untitled, the follow-up to the Grammy-winning " The Heist " (2012) has been preceded by Ed Sheeran -assisted "Growing Up (Sloane's Song)" and "Downtown" that features appearances from rap pioneers such as Grandmaster Caz, Kool Moe Dee and Melle Mel. The latter has so far peaked at No. 15 on Billboard Hot 100.
